title: notocactus
author: notocactus
content: I need another loan$1,000 USDTPeriod: 1 monthRepayment amount: $1,100Receiving address (USDT on TRC-20): Will send in DMWho can make this deal, please leave your message here first, then we will make agreement and execute it after that.Thanks.

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: I made the loan repayment minutes ago. Please confirm then I will lock this thread.Thank you so much for the loan, TryNinja. Â Edit:- Just see I made a typo, 1110 rather than 1100. Please reserve it if I have another loan with you, then we can sort it out.

Can I return the extra $10 to the loan address (or a new one)?Yeah, if you want, you can send it back to the same address. Thanks.Received it. Thanks. I lock the thread for now.
